title: 30% Off Premium Flower Friday
description: Get 30% off all premium flower strains including our signature OG Kush, Blue Dream, and Wedding Cake. Limited time offer while supplies last.
terms: Cannot be combined with other offers. Valid for premium flower only. Maximum purchase limit applies.

title: Buy 2 Get 1 Free Edibles
description: Mix and match any edibles in our selection. Perfect opportunity to try new flavors and brands at unbeatable prices.
terms: Lowest priced item free. Valid on all edible products. While supplies last.

title: $20 Off Concentrate Orders Over $100
description: Save big on premium concentrates including live resin, rosin, and shatter. Perfect for experienced users looking for potency.
terms: Minimum purchase of $100 required. Valid on concentrate products only.

title: Happy Hour: 25% Off Everything
description: Daily happy hour special from 4-6 PM. Get 25% off your entire purchase including flower, edibles, and accessories.
terms: Valid during happy hour only (4-6 PM). Cannot be combined with other offers.

title: New Customer: 20% Off First Visit
description: Welcome to Floro! First-time customers receive 20% off their entire first purchase. Great way to explore our premium selection.
terms: Valid for new customers only. ID verification required. One-time use per customer.

title: Vape Cartridge Bundle Deal
description: Buy any 3 vape cartridges and get the 4th one free. Mix and match from our premium selection of strains and brands.
terms: Must purchase 3 to get 4th free. Lowest priced item free. Valid on cartridges only.

title: Medical Monday: 15% Off All Products
description: Every Monday, medical patients receive an additional 15% off all products. Valid medical card required.
terms: Valid medical marijuana card required. Cannot be combined with other promotions.

title: Flash Sale: 40% Off Select Edibles
description: Limited 6-hour flash sale on select gummy and chocolate edibles. Perfect for trying new products at amazing prices.
terms: Valid on select products only. While supplies last. No rain checks.

title: Weekend Warrior: $15 Off $75+
description: Weekend special for all customers. Save $15 on any purchase over $75. Perfect for stocking up on your favorites.
terms: Minimum purchase of $75 required. Valid Saturday and Sunday only.

title: Accessories Bundle: Buy 2, Save 30%
description: Stock up on smoking accessories with our bundle deal. Buy any 2 accessories and save 30% on your purchase.
terms: Must purchase minimum of 2 accessories. Valid on accessories only.

title: Top Shelf Thursday: Premium at Mid-Tier Prices
description: Every Thursday, get our premium top-shelf flower at mid-tier prices. Experience the highest quality at affordable rates.
terms: Valid on premium flower only. Thursday special. Limited quantities available.

title: Concentrate Connoisseur: 3 for 2 Deal
description: For the concentrate enthusiasts - buy any 2 concentrate products and get the 3rd one absolutely free. Mix and match available.
terms: Buy 2 get 3rd free. Lowest priced item free. Valid on all concentrate products.
